item.title: contact me
item.description: your best bet is probably email, but i’m also terrible at that since i’m a millenial and am socially avoidant while stressed email: # jonathan [at] pulsifer.ca GitHub # github.com/jonpulsifer LinkedIn # linkedin.com/jonpulsifer Twitter # twitter.com/jonpulsifer
item.content:
your best bet is probably email, but i’m also terrible at that since i’m a millenial and am socially avoidant while stressed

  • email:   # jonathan [at] pulsifer.ca
  • GitHub   # github.com/jonpulsifer
  • LinkedIn # linkedin.com/jonpulsifer
  • Twitter  # twitter.com/jonpulsifer

item.title: whoami
item.description: greetings hi, i’m @jonpulsifer and i like computers ^__^ this is my personal website. here you’ll usually find some semblance of a blog, welcome page, or otherwise a way to contact me. I work^W used to work at Shopify as a Staff Security Engineer where I was the technical lead for Cloud Security with a focus on Kubernetes and Google Cloud Platform before making the switch to Security Incident Response.
item.content:
greetings

hi, i’m @jonpulsifer and i like computers ^__^

this is my personal website. here you’ll usually find some semblance of a blog, welcome page, or otherwise a way to contact me.

I work^W used to work at Shopify as a Staff Security Engineer where I was the technical lead for Cloud Security with a focus on Kubernetes and Google Cloud Platform before making the switch to Security Incident Response.

$ id
uid=1337(jawn) gid=1337(jawn) groups=1337(jawn),27(sudo)

$ finger jawn
Login: jawn Name: Jonathan Pulsifer
Directory: /home/jawn Shell: /bin/zsh
Office: Remote
PGP key:
'0x0472D3B3F5012430'
Project:
'Funemployment'
Plan:
'Get internet, then get a new job'
